New Records: Youri Tielemans scored the third quickest goal in European Championship history
Key Match Events: Belgium won 2-0 against Romania with goals from Youri Tielemans and Kevin De Bruyne
Belgium missed several chances before and after the break
Florin Nita saved several shots on goal for Romania
Dennis Man had Romania's best chance in the second half but was smothered by Koen Casteels
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium looked to bounce back from a shock matchday 1 defeat to Slovakia
The Red Devils asserted their credentials at Euro 2024 with a 2-0 victory over Romania
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium's record at international tournaments in the last decade has been poor, but this win gives them a foothold at Euro 2024
Jan Vertonghen slotted into defence effortlessly, while De Bruyne turned in the kind of performance we see on a regular basis for Manchester City
Miscellaneous Highlights: The result means that all four teams in Group E now have three points, with the remaining fixtures to be played on Wednesday
This was the third disallowed goal for Romelu Lukaku at Euro 2024
